00062 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 //  Find the most and least significant non-zero bits in a unsigned long
00064 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 
00066 #define MSB_STATEMENT(n) if( x >> n ) { x >>= n; i += n; }
00067 
00068 inline
00069 int
00070 scfx_find_msb( unsigned long x )
00071 {
00072     int i = 0;
00073 #   if defined(SC_LONG_64)
00074         MSB_STATEMENT( 32 );
00075 #   endif // defined(SC_LONG_64)
00076     MSB_STATEMENT( 16 );
00077     MSB_STATEMENT( 8 );
00078     MSB_STATEMENT( 4 );
00079     MSB_STATEMENT( 2 );
00080     MSB_STATEMENT( 1 );
00081     return i;
00082 }
00083 
00084 #undef MSB_STATEMENT
00085 
00086 #define LSB_STATEMENT(n) if( x << n ) { x <<= n; i -= n; }
00087 
00088 inline
00089 int
00090 scfx_find_lsb( unsigned long x )
00091 {
00092     int i;
00093 #   if defined(SC_LONG_64)
00094         i = 63;
00095         LSB_STATEMENT( 32 );
00096 #   else
00097         i = 31;
00098 #   endif // defined(SC_LONG_64)
00099     LSB_STATEMENT( 16 );
00100     LSB_STATEMENT( 8 );
00101     LSB_STATEMENT( 4 );
00102     LSB_STATEMENT( 2 );
00103     LSB_STATEMENT( 1 );
00104     return i;
00105 }
00106 
00107 #undef LSB_STATEMENT

00110 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 //  Utilities for parsing a character string number
00112 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 
00114 inline
00115 int
00116 scfx_parse_sign( const char*& s, bool& sign_char )
00117 {
00118     int sign = 1;
00119 
00120     if( *s == '+' )
00121     {
00122         ++ s;
00123         sign_char = true;
00124     }
00125     else if( *s == '-' )
00126     {
00127         sign = -1;
00128         ++ s;
00129         sign_char = true;
00130     }
00131     else
00132         sign_char = false;
00133 
00134     return sign;
00135 }
00136 
00137 inline
00138 sc_numrep
00139 scfx_parse_prefix( const char*& s )
00140 {
00141     if( s[0] == '0' ) {
00142         switch( s[1] )
00143         {
00144             case 'b':
00145             case 'B':
00146             {
00147                 if( (s[2] == 'u' || s[2] == 'U') && (s[3] == 's' || s[3] == 'S') ) {
00148                     s += 4;
00149                     return SC_BIN_US;
00150                 }
00151                 if( (s[2] == 's' || s[2] == 'S') && (s[3] == 'm' || s[3] == 'M') ) {
00152                     s += 4;
00153                     return SC_BIN_SM;
00154                 }
00155                 s += 2;
00156                 return SC_BIN;
00157             }
00158             case 'o':
00159             case 'O':
00160             {
00161                 if( (s[2] == 'u' || s[2] == 'U') && (s[3] == 's' || s[3] == 'S') ) {
00162                     s += 4;
00163                     return SC_OCT_US;
00164                 }
00165                 if( (s[2] == 's' || s[2] == 'S') && (s[3] == 'm' || s[3] == 'M') ) {
00166                     s += 4;
00167                     return SC_OCT_SM;
00168                 }
00169                 s += 2;
00170                 return SC_OCT;
00171             }
00172             case 'x':
00173             case 'X':
00174             {
00175                 if( (s[2] == 'u' || s[2] == 'U') && (s[3] == 's' || s[3] == 'S') ) {
00176                     s += 4;
00177                     return SC_HEX_US;
00178                 }
00179                 if( (s[2] == 's' || s[2] == 'S') && (s[3] == 'm' || s[3] == 'M') ) {
00180                     s += 4;
00181                     return SC_HEX_SM;
00182                 }
00183                 s += 2;
00184                 return SC_HEX;
00185             }
00186             case 'd':
00187             case 'D':
00188             {
00189                 s += 2;
00190                 return SC_DEC;
00191             }
00192             case 'c':
00193             case 'C':
00194             {
00195                 if( (s[2] == 's' || s[2] == 'S') && (s[3] == 'd' || s[3] == 'D') ) {
00196                     s += 4;
00197                     return SC_CSD;
00198                 }
00199                 break;
00200             }
00201             default:
00202                 break;
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     return SC_DEC;
00207 }

00210 inline
00211 int
00212 scfx_parse_base( const char*& s )
00213 {
00214     const char* s1 = s + 1;
00215 
00216     int base = 10;
00217 
00218     if( *s == '0' )
00219     {
00220         switch( *s1 )
00221         {
00222             case 'b':
00223             case 'B': base =  2; s += 2; break;
00224             case 'o':
00225             case 'O': base =  8; s += 2; break;
00226             case 'd':
00227             case 'D': base = 10; s += 2; break;
00228             case 'x':
00229             case 'X': base = 16; s += 2; break;
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233     return base;
00234 }
00235 
00236 inline
00237 bool
00238 scfx_is_equal( const char* a, const char* b )
00239 {
00240     while( *a != 0 && *b != 0 && *a == *b )
00241     {
00242         ++ a;
00243         ++ b;
00244     }
00245     return ( *a == 0 && *b == 0 );
00246 }
00247 
00248 inline
00249 bool
00250 scfx_is_nan( const char* s )
00251 {
00252     return scfx_is_equal( s, "NaN" );
00253 }
00254 
00255 inline
00256 bool
00257 scfx_is_inf( const char* s )
00258 {
00259     return ( scfx_is_equal( s, "Inf" ) || scfx_is_equal( s, "Infinity" ) );
00260 }
00261 
00262 inline
00263 bool
00264 scfx_exp_start( const char* s )
00265 {
00266     if( *s == 'e' || *s == 'E' )
00267     {
00268         ++ s;
00269         if( *s == '+' || *s == '-' )
00270             return true;
00271     }
00272     return false;
00273 }
00274 
00275 inline
00276 bool
00277 scfx_is_digit( char c, sc_numrep numrep )
00278 {
00279     bool is_digit;
00280 
00281     switch( numrep )
00282     {
00283         case SC_DEC:
00284         {
00285             switch( c )
00286             {
00287                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00288                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00289                 {
00290                     is_digit = true;
00291                     break;
00292                 }
00293                 default:
00294                     is_digit = false;
00295             }
00296             break;
00297         }
00298         case SC_BIN:
00299         case SC_BIN_US:
00300         case SC_BIN_SM:
00301         {
00302             switch( c )
00303             {
00304                 case '0': case '1':
00305                 {
00306                     is_digit = true;
00307                     break;
00308                 }
00309                 default:
00310                     is_digit = false;
00311             }
00312             break;
00313         }
00314         case SC_OCT:
00315         case SC_OCT_US:
00316         case SC_OCT_SM:
00317         {
00318             switch( c )
00319             {
00320                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3':
00321                 case '4': case '5': case '6': case '7':
00322                 {
00323                     is_digit = true;
00324                     break;
00325                 }
00326                 default:
00327                     is_digit = false;
00328             }
00329             break;
00330         }
00331         case SC_HEX:
00332         case SC_HEX_US:
00333         case SC_HEX_SM:
00334         {
00335             switch( c )
00336             {
00337                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00338                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00339                 case 'a': case 'b': case 'c': case 'd': case 'e': case 'f':
00340                 case 'A': case 'B': case 'C': case 'D': case 'E': case 'F':
00341                 {
00342                     is_digit = true;
00343                     break;
00344                 }
00345                 default:
00346                     is_digit = false;
00347             }
00348             break;
00349         }
00350         case SC_CSD:
00351         {
00352             switch( c )
00353             {
00354                 case '0': case '1': case '-':
00355                 {
00356                     is_digit = true;
00357                     break;
00358                 }
00359                 default:
00360                     is_digit = false;
00361             }
00362             break;
00363         }
00364         default:
00365             is_digit = false;
00366     }
00367 
00368     return is_digit;
00369 }
00370 
00371 inline
00372 int
00373 scfx_to_digit( char c, sc_numrep numrep )
00374 {
00375     int to_digit;
00376     
00377     switch( numrep )
00378     {
00379         case SC_DEC:
00380         case SC_BIN:
00381         case SC_BIN_US:
00382         case SC_BIN_SM:
00383         case SC_OCT:
00384         case SC_OCT_US:
00385         case SC_OCT_SM:
00386         {
00387             to_digit = c - '0';
00388             break;
00389         }
00390         case SC_HEX:
00391         case SC_HEX_US:
00392         case SC_HEX_SM:
00393         {
00394             switch( c )
00395             {
00396                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00397                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00398                     to_digit = c - '0';
00399                     break;
00400                 case 'a': case 'b': case 'c': case 'd': case 'e': case 'f':
00401                     to_digit = c - 'a' + 10;
00402                     break;
00403                 case 'A': case 'B': case 'C': case 'D': case 'E': case 'F':
00404                     to_digit = c - 'A' + 10;
00405                     break;
00406                 default:
00407                     to_digit = -2;
00408             }
00409             break;
00410         }
00411         case SC_CSD:
00412         {
00413             if( c == '-' )
00414                 to_digit = -1;
00415             else
00416                 to_digit = c - '0';
00417             break;
00418         }
00419         default:
00420             to_digit = -2;
00421     }
00422 
00423     return to_digit;
00424 }

00433 scfx_print_nan( scfx_string& s )

00435     s += "NaN";

00438 inline
00439 void
00440 scfx_print_inf( scfx_string& s, bool negative )
00441 {
00442     if( negative )
00443         s += "-Inf";
00444     else
00445         s += "Inf";
00446 }
00447 
00448 inline
00449 void
00450 scfx_print_prefix( scfx_string& s, sc_numrep numrep )
00451 {
00452     switch( numrep )
00453     {
00454         case SC_DEC:
00455             s += "0d";
00456             break;
00457         case SC_BIN:
00458             s += "0b";
00459             break;
00460         case SC_BIN_US:
00461             s += "0bus";
00462             break;
00463         case SC_BIN_SM:
00464             s += "0bsm";
00465             break;
00466         case SC_OCT:
00467             s += "0o";
00468             break;
00469         case SC_OCT_US:
00470             s += "0ous";
00471             break;
00472         case SC_OCT_SM:
00473             s += "0osm";
00474             break;
00475         case SC_HEX:
00476             s += "0x";
00477             break;
00478         case SC_HEX_US:
00479             s += "0xus";
00480             break;
00481         case SC_HEX_SM:
00482             s += "0xsm";
00483             break;
00484         case SC_CSD:
00485             s += "0csd";
00486             break;
00487         default:
00488             s += "unknown";
00489     }
00490 }
00491 
00492 inline
00493 void
00494 scfx_print_exp( scfx_string& s, int exp )
00495 {
00496     if( exp != 0 )
00497     {
00498         s += 'e';
00499                 
00500         if( exp < 0 )
00501         {
00502             exp = - exp;
00503             s += '-';
00504         }
00505         else
00506             s += '+';
00507 
00508         bool first = true;
00509         int scale = 1000000000;
00510         do
00511         {
00512             int digit = exp / scale;
00513             exp = exp % scale;
00514             if( digit != 0 || ! first )
00515             {
00516                 s += static_cast<char>( digit + '0' );
00517                 first = false;
00518             }
00519             scale /= 10;
00520         }
00521         while( scale > 0 );
00522     }
00523 }
